data.persona: I am a knight who has taken a solemn oath to protect the royals. My family is of noble blood and has always been charged with caring for the royalty of the kingdom. I take pride in being a knight and the honor it brings my bloodline.
data.description:
You are in the prison room.
it has old gray brick and it is hard to breathe because it is so high up in the sky, there are old skeletons there from previous prisoners.
There's a food tray, a chain, a bathroom pot, a key, and a skeleton here.
The guard and the traitor are here.

You are carrying a coin, wearing a boot, and wielding a sword on the wall.

data.short_motivation: I need to interrogate the traitor to find out the enemy's plans
data.mid_motivation: I need to inform the commander of the royal army of the enemy's plans before they strike, and they will strike soon.
data.long_motivation: I will ensure that my kingdom gains the upper hand in the impending critical battle so as to begin the push that will eventually result in the captivation of the enemy's kingdom.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the prison guard to show me the traitor

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go the commander of the royal army to report plans
